g.text: The poorest 50% live on less than $9.35 a day

text.style: font-size: 9px; font-family: 'Arial', 'DejaVu Sans', 'Liberation Sans', 'Bitstream Vera Sans', sans-serif
font-size: 9px; font-family: 'Arial', 'DejaVu Sans', 'Liberation Sans', 'Bitstream Vera Sans', sans-serif

g.text: $30 corresponds to the poverty line of a high-income country

text.style: font-size: 9px; font-family: 'Arial', 'DejaVu Sans', 'Liberation Sans', 'Bitstream Vera Sans', sans-serif

font-size: 8px; font-family: 'Arial', 'DejaVu Sans', 'Liberation Sans', 'Bitstream Vera Sans', sans-serif

g.text: Globally, 80.8% live on less than $30 a day
